author: mbautin
msg: [HBASE-6727][89-fb] allow HBaseServer's callqueue to be configurable to avoid OOMs
Added SizeBasedThrottler which is increased by the size of the
request when we try to add a request in callQueue and decreased in
Handler after take() is performed on the callQueue.
Test Plan: run unit test suite. Anything else?

author: mbautin
msg: [HBASE-2376] Introduce a Flash Back Time parameter in HColumnDescriptor.
For the purpose of supporting flash back queries in HBase we
need a new parameter at a column family level which specifies how far
back in time we support flash back queries.
